fields.title: Career
fields.text:
Journalism meets innovation here — where creative storytelling, smart strategy, and user-centric product development come together.

At Deutsche Welle, Germany’s international broadcaster, I’ve worn many hats — from creating impactful stories and leading editorial work on video formats to collaborating in cross-functional teams and driving strategic and digital product development.
- Video reporter and editor
- Program and Portfolio Manager
- Owner Product Development Process  

My professional toolkit combines media expertise with modern management skills.
- Storytelling & Video Production
- Strategic Portfolio Management, 
- Journalistic Product Management
- Agile Methodologies
- Workshop Facilitation & Training

Curious by nature, I keep learning to stay ahead in a fast-changing media world.
- Coding for Journalists
- Digital Product Management
- AI Product Management
- Project Management
- Prompting Essentials
